page.title: 16Life in Little Berkhamsted.1
page.content:
During the summer term, we went to Little Berkhamsted and interviewed a number of people with a general questionnaire, designed to gauge their {ATTITUDES}to life in a village. Little Berkhamsted is a typical, small Herts village with a declining{POPULATION}of 414. We received answers from 37 representative households. The vast majority of the interviewed (there was only one exception) said they enjoyed living in a small village and many of the older inhabitants felt that there was a strong community spirit. {KEY:-N=NO,Y=YES,DK=DON'T KNOW.
Questions:- Do you feel at all remote or cut off,living in a small village? 28N,9Y. Do you enjoy living in a small village?1N,36Y.
